components.title: Hero Image Slider
components.description: Full-width hero image slider with call-to-action buttons. Perfect for showcasing featured products, promotions, and brand messaging at the top of your homepage.
components.keyword: hero, slider, banner, banner carousel, featured, amazon, shopify, homepage, hero section

components.title: Daily Best Sells
components.description: Horizontal scrolling product slider displaying best-selling or featured products. Essential for e-commerce themes like Amazon and Shopify.
components.keyword: product slider, carousel, best sellers, featured products, amazon clone, e-commerce, shopify, trending products

components.title: Popular Categories
components.description: Category slider showcasing product categories with images. Great for navigation and improving user experience on marketplace and grocery stores.
components.keyword: category slider, product categories, category navigation, amazon, grocery store, marketplace, shopping categories

components.title: Promo Banner Grid
components.description: Multi-section promotional banner grid with customizable layouts. Perfect for displaying multiple promotional campaigns, sales, and offers.
components.keyword: promo banner, promotional campaigns, sales banner, discount banner, offer section, marketing banner, amazon deals

components.title: Newsletter Signup
components.description: Email subscription form for capturing leads and building email list. Includes customizable colors, messaging, and call-to-action buttons.
components.keyword: newsletter, email subscription, lead capture, contact form, subscriber list, email marketing

data.heading: SUBSCRIBE TO KNOW ABOUT OFFERS
data.subheading: Get exclusive deals and updates delivered to your inbox

components.title: Shop by Brands
components.description: Display brand logos in a grid layout. Allows customers to shop by their favorite brands. Common in electronics, fashion, and marketplace stores.
components.keyword: brands, brand showcase, brand slider, brand logos, electronics brands, fashion brands, amazon, marketplace

components.title: Product Slider with Tabs
components.description: Product slider with tab filtering. Show different product categories through tabs (Featured, Popular, New). Great for amazon-style layouts.
components.keyword: slider tabs, tabbed products, product tabs, featured products, popular products, new arrivals, amazon clone

components.title: Customer Testimonials
components.description: Display customer reviews and testimonials in a carousel slider. Builds trust and credibility for your store.
components.keyword: testimonials, reviews, customer reviews, ratings, feedback, social proof, trust, amazon reviews
